analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#307) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#404-440)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#518-540)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#615-626)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#636-648)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#711-720) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol:
	Contract CrowdsaleTokenController has payable functions:
	 - proxyPayment (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#451-470):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#466-468)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#468-469)

Reentrancy in Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#923-963):
	External calls:
	- weiContributed = deployedPresaleContract.balanceOf(investorAddress) (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#936-937)
	- bntyCompensation = Math.min256(weiToBnty(weiContributed),bounty0xToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#944-946)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensPaid (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#948-950)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#743-759) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#756-757)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#679-680) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#721-723)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- weiContributed = deployedPresaleContract.balanceOf(investorAddress) (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#936-937)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- bntyCompensation = Math.min256(weiToBnty(weiContributed),bounty0xToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#944-946)

Bounty0xPresaleDistributor.compensatePreSaleInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(bounty0xToken.transfer(investorAddress,bntyCompensation)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#955-957)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#711-720)
	- /unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#717-719
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#278)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/2/0xd2d6158683aee4cc838067727209a0aaf4359de3.sol#1086-1088:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"
